title: The Harmony of Discord
description:
I discuss my experience of finding belonging and a sense of community in the Discord group "Bridges of Meaning"

Join Bridges of Meaning here: https://discord.gg/zXMCKh

My interview with Randos United: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TTqqwPkV4NU

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis

transcript_parts.text: hello there friends Andrea with the
bangs here and I'd like to take a moment
to talk about discord one group in
particular called bridges of meaning I
joined this group I can't remember what
I think it was a few months ago one of
my guests Paul van der clay invited me
to join this group now I had never
participated in anything like this
before I have been on Twitter for almost
two years now I mean I guess there's
Facebook but that's basically like a
family album sort of thing twitter has
been my main social media that I've used
and it's great I I really enjoy Twitter
so coming on the discord was quite a
different way of doing social media I
guess you can't really make your own
posts they have one continuous like
newsfeed sort of thing where you write
things and you can add people but it
just keeps on going and going and you
don't really have your own page it's
different like I said I found how
egocentric Twitter is actually I mean if
you want you can be out in the newsfeed
but you also can just hang out in your
own page and look at your own posts and
see what people are saying to you which
totally makes sense because you're
posting about things you care about so
you know there's nothing wrong with
being interested in what people have to
comment about what you're saying but it
is a different way of navigating
participation so I really really liked
it when I joined and it was very
welcoming and I had people being very
friendly and one of the first things I
said is am I free to share my doubts
here and everyone is like yes please
like there's a mix of different
denominations of Christians within
Protestantism and Orthodox and
Catholicism and then there are atheists
and agnostics I I believe it was started
as a way to facilitate meetups from
people who were interested in the
meaning pricess brought to light through
people like Jordan Peterson and so
everyone who's there is
therefore looking deeper into the world
and what where we find our meaning and
how we find our answers and how we find
things that we strive for and anyway
yeah you get the picture it's a group of
people who I really fit in very well
with because I love that I love looking
for meaning that's one of the things I'm
exploring on my channel I sort of
dropped off I think I was on for a
couple weeks and then maybe there's a
few months in between because it's like
I said it's new and it's different and
you kind of have to make a bit more of
an effort than you do on Twitter for me
I'm very used to Twitter but with this
court you just sort of have to get used
to out to have conversations with people
recently I was interviewed by one of the
people who is pretty frequent on the
discord his name's Jeff and his YouTube
channel is called randos unite so he
interviewed me on his channel and it was
a really good sort of reintroduction
back into the discord and I'd want to
get back into the group and I've been
trying to get back into exploring what
the group has to offer so I am really
excited to feel like I have a community
there of people who are looking for
something that I'm looking for as well
and I wanted to just make this little
video as a thank you to them
anyone who's part of the discord
watching thank you for making me feel
accepted I appreciate it and another
reason why I wanted to make this is
because a lack of community is something
that I've been thinking about and I'm
wondering about how you all are doing
how are you finding your community are
you able to Skype people or zoom people
are you calling people do you have
groups like the discord group I'm
describing do you find that on Facebook
or on Twitter
do you feel a lack of community right
now I'm curious as to where you all are
at and I hope you are doing okay and
that you aren't too lonely and I'll put
the discord link in the description if
you are interested in joining and as
always please do not forget to subscribe
to my channel if you haven't yet because
it just makes me look like I'm more
credible if I have more subscribers and
then I can get more people to agree to
be on my show thank you guys for
watching this I hope you have a
wonderful evening or day whatever time
of day it is see you next time
